name: Service
description: A service provided by an organization, e.g. delivery service, print services, etc.
title: Service

fields.name: serviceArea
fields.title: serviceArea
fields.description: The geographic area where the service is provided.

fields.name: produces
fields.title: produces
fields.description: The tangible thing generated by the service, e.g. a passport, permit, etc.

fields.name: provider
fields.title: provider
fields.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.

fields.name: serviceAudience
fields.title: serviceAudience
fields.description: The audience eligible for this service.

fields.name: areaServed
fields.title: areaServed
fields.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

fields.name: audience
fields.title: audience
fields.description: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.

fields.name: hasOfferCatalog
fields.title: hasOfferCatalog
fields.description: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

fields.name: hoursAvailable
fields.title: hoursAvailable
fields.description: The hours during which this service or contact is available.

fields.name: providerMobility
fields.title: providerMobility
fields.description: Indicates the mobility of a provided service (e.g. 'static', 'dynamic').

fields.name: aggregateRating
fields.title: aggregateRating
fields.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

fields.name: offers
fields.title: offers
fields.description: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.

fields.name: award
fields.title: award
fields.description: An award won by or for this item.

fields.name: category
fields.title: category
fields.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

fields.name: broker
fields.title: broker
fields.description: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.

fields.name: serviceOutput
fields.title: serviceOutput
fields.description: The tangible thing generated by the service, e.g. a passport, permit, etc.

fields.name: logo
fields.title: logo
fields.description: An associated logo.

fields.name: isSimilarTo
fields.title: isSimilarTo
fields.description: A pointer to another, functionally similar product (or multiple products).

fields.name: isRelatedTo
fields.title: isRelatedTo
fields.description: A pointer to another, somehow related product (or multiple products).

fields.name: availableChannel
fields.title: availableChannel
fields.description: A means of accessing the service (e.g. a phone bank, a web site, a location, etc.).

fields.name: review
fields.title: review
fields.description: A review of the item.

fields.name: serviceType
fields.title: serviceType
fields.description: The type of service being offered, e.g. veterans' benefits, emergency relief, etc.

fields.name: brand
fields.title: brand
fields.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.
